lines.text: [first lines]
[Sam hands Matt a cup of coffee]
Thanks, Sam.
Did you decide what kind of cake you want?
Just keep it simple. I don't want Beth and Josh to think they're on the wrong spread.
You say that every birthday!
You know, it's not really a party without candles on your cake.
What did we do last year?
It slips my mind. How many candles was it?
Oh, I'd say it was over 21.
You say that every year!
[although Matt warned him to stay out of trouble, Davis starts a bar room brawl]
All you salesman that rowdy?
Hey, nobody starts in barbed wire! I've been a few things.
Any of 'em effect your hearing?
You warned me. Sorry.
Sorry gets it once.
[Matt captures a murderous outlaw and brings him to the Tucson sheriff for trial]
Anybody but you, Matt, would have left him to the buzzards.
That might be cruelty to animals.
